Description:
V.  MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS Diploma holder or bachelor’s degree –in Relevant discipline Data Management/ Engineering.
10-15 years of Experience of which 10yrs QC experience with direct scope description as QA/QC Document Controller / DCC Lead.

Report writing skills
Team player
Experience of working in a multicultural project team
Middle East project experienceDesirable Qualifications, Experience and SkillsExperienced in Programming / Automation.
